price: 56. En iedereen die Allah, Zijn boodschapper en degenen die geloven als beschermers neemt, zij maken de partij van Allah tot overwinnaars!
arabic: وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ فَإِنَّ حِزۡبَ ٱللَّهِ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: waman yatawalla al-laha warasūlahu wa-alladhīna āmanū fa-inna ḥiz'ba al-lahi humu al-ghālibūna
